dmca.title: [EV1-C1556712K] hot-tubs.quck.info
dmca.body:
Please note that the website referenced in your below-pasted complaint does not reside within our network as of 1:49:50 p.m. (GMT-6) on October 30, 2006. Legal Response Team The Planet -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Friday, October 27, 2006 11:51 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1556712K] hot-tubs.quck.info Subject: [EV1-C1556712K] hot-tubs.quck.info ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. hot-tubs.quck.info Added by system at Friday, Oct 27 2006 10:57 am X-MailFrom: ian@discountspasdirect.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Oct 26 03:22:55 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:22:42 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:22:42 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from ian@discountspasdirect.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Gd0Vd-0006DE-Pm; Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:22:42 -0500 Received: from fed1rmmtao11.cox.net ([68.230.241.28]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from ian@discountspasdirect.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Gd0VZ-0008dM-EF; Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:22:37 -0500 Received: from fed1rmimpo01.cox.net ([70.169.32.71]) by fed1rmmtao11.cox.net (InterMail vM.6.01.06.01 201-2131-130-101-20060113) with ESMTP id <20061026082141.IIUT13992.fed1rmmtao11.cox.net@fed1rmimpo01.cox.net>; Thu, 26 Oct 2006 04:21:41 -0400 Received: from xpsgen3 ([68.106.10.23]) by fed1rmimpo01.cox.net with bizsmtp id ewMJ1V00J0VpdNC0000000 Thu, 26 Oct 2006 04:21:24 -0400 From: "Ian - DiscountSpasDirect.com" To: , Cc: "'Chris Ormiston'" , "'Rick Cobb'" Subject: hot-tubs.quck.info Date: Thu, 26 Oct 2006 01:21:32 -0700 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0491_01C6F89D.128D4580" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.6353 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 Thread-Index: Acb4176YvOUgmKe9S+udYIpt1tFH3Q== Message-Id: <20061026082141.IIUT13992.fed1rmmtao11.cox.net@fed1rmimpo01.cox.net> Received-SPF: unknown (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: error in processing during lookup of domain of discountspasdirect.com: DNS lookup failure) client-ip=68.230.241.28; envelope-from=ian@discountspasdirect.com; helo=fed1rmmtao11.cox.net; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 26 Oct 2006 08:22:42.0128 (UTC) FILETIME=[E80A3D00:01C6F8D7] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To Whom It May Concern: Please be advised that a customer on your web hosting service, hot-tubs.quck.info/ , is violating many Federal Trademark and Copyright violations. We ask that you take immediate action in removing this account from your servers. As you can see by looking at Google's cache of the page hot-tubs.quck.info, the user has copied our entire website www.DiscountSpasDirect.com verbatim and cloaked his content. If you go to the site http://hot-tubs.quck.info you will see that it redirects you to http://phvw.com/ which is a random spam directory having nothing to do with Hot Tubs and Spas. DiscountSpasDirect.com is currently the world's largest hot tub and spa distributor on the Internet worldwide. The site http:// hot-tubs.quck.info is costing us tremendous amounts of lost revenue every minute. Thank you in advance for your cooperation. Ian Rakow CEO Ian@DiscountSpasDirect.com Cc: Rick Cobb, atty MIME element (text/html)

To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please be advised that a customer on your web hosting service, hot-tubs.quck.info/ ,  is violating many Federal Trademark and Copyright violations.  We ask that you take immediate action in removing this account from your servers.

 

As you can see by looking at Google’s cache of the page hot-tubs.quck.info, the user has copied our entire website www.DiscountSpasDirect.com verbatim and cloaked his content.  If you go to the site http://hot-tubs.quck.info you will see that it redirects you to http://phvw.com/ which is a random spam directory having nothing to do with Hot Tubs and Spas.

 

DiscountSpasDirect.com is currently the world’s largest hot tub and spa distributor on the Internet worldwide.  The site http:// hot-tubs.quck.info is costing us tremendous amounts of lost revenue every minute.

 

Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

 

Ian Rakow

CEO

Ian@DiscountSpasDirect.com< o:p>

 

Cc: Rick Cobb, atty

MIME element (text/plain)
